title: Fata Morgana III, Disko Bay, Greenland
description: black and white image of iceberg spanning entire length of piece at center; water at bottom and sky with light wispy clouds at top; highest point of iceberg at center with very light lines forming triangle-like tip incised in ice face; L and R sides appear to be mirror images of each other; framed behind Plexiglas in white wood frame; seam in Plexiglas at 79\" from R
